alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 405 PM EDT/305 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wewahitchka to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Overstreet, Honeyville, Davis Beach, Allanton, Wetappo, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
